items.sentence: Tom said he just wanted to spend some time by himself.
Most people spend about a third of their lives in bed.
Tom's parents hope that he'll become a doctor someday.
Tom went to Australia to stay with one of his cousins.
Some people seem to always want to have the last word.
Why don't we see if we can come up with a better plan?
How long has it been since Tom got his last promotion?
If it's necessary to do so, I'll pay back my loan now.
Tom and his father work on the same construction crew.
What's the difference between astronomy and astrology?
